entry.title: EXTREME COLD WARNING , Peawanuck
entry.summary: Persons in or near this area should be on the lookout for adverse weather conditions and take necessary safety precautions. Issued: 02:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Current Conditions: Mainly Clear, -32.9°C

entry.title: Friday: Periods of snow. High minus 16.
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. Periods of snow beginning this morning. Amount 2 cm. Wind becoming south 30 km/h this morning. High minus 16. Wind chill minus 39 this morning and minus 25 this afternoon. Risk of frostbite. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Friday night: Chance of flurries. Low minus 30. POP 60%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this evening and after midnight. Wind becoming northwest 20 km/h gusting to 50 this evening then increasing to 40 gusting to 60 after midnight. Low minus 30. Wind chill minus 26 this evening and minus 44 overnight. Frostbite in minutes. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023

entry.title: Saturday: Mainly sunny. High minus 25.
entry.summary: Mainly sunny. Wind northwest 30 km/h. High minus 25. Wind chill minus 46 in the morning and minus 37 in the afternoon. Frostbite in minutes. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 05:30 AM EST Friday 17 February 2023
